title: hammondIntro
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Hello everyone, I hope you all have had a safe flight. We have alot to show you here. 
You will travel back to the Prehistoric Era with what you will witness today. 
Have some time to settle in and be ready to leave the Lodge soon for the tour!  
Also everyone, please keep in mind....  
This park is near and dear to me, so please treat it with respect.
With that said...
<< introSpeechFinished >>
Welcome everyone, to [color=#eef704]Jurrassic Park![/color] 
And you! Umm....  
What was your name again?  
You know what forget it!
I can't even remember half of the faces that I hire!
I'll just call you [color=#eef704]Techy[/color].
Being the new technician, you are going to fix any electrical issues the park may encounter. 
[color=#eef704]Ed Regis[/color], with the [color=#eef704]sunglasses[/color], will give you a tour around the Lodge, where most of the operations take place. 
Before you're off, make sure not to [color=#eef704]hurt[/color] any of MY [color=#eef704]dinosaurs[/color].
It is park property and costs alot of money. Anyways, welcome aboard the Jurassic Park team!

title: doorOne
body:
The door seems to be automatic or may be controlled remotely.
It seems to be totally reliant on electricity.

title: plantOne
body:
In front of you appears to be a gianormous plant much taller than yourself.
There also seems to be a plaque right next to it.
It says "Do NOT touch the plants!"
[[ Touch It: |plantTouched]]
[[ Don't Touch It: |plantNotTouched]]

title: plantTouched
body:
You reach in to touch the plant and...
<< peeled>> fail to see the banana that you end up slipping on.
Everyone saw it and it was hilarious.

title: plantNotTouched
body:
You decided to obey the law of the sign and walked away...
<< peeled>> But then you accidentally slip on a banana peel and touch it anyways
<< headSprites arnold>> what the hell technician!
I specifically put that sign there for a reason!
Huh? A banana peel?
Yeah right, i'll believe it when I see it.

title: plantTwo
body: You lost your plant appetite and deem plants as your mortal enemy.

title: hammondOne
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Hello Techy, please tell me if there are any issues with your coworkers.
Especially that damned [color=#eef704]Nedry.[/color]

title: hammondTwo
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Y'know thinking back on your resume, you are a pretty suspicious individual.
You have no education, no experience, and absolutely no qualifying skills to do this job.
But I like your moxie kid so you get a pass.

title: hammondThree
body:
<< headSprites hammond>> 
Look Techy, I've got a group to tour and you've got a job to do.
Get to work.

title: nedryOne
body:
Ugh.. Damn machine!
Worthless piece of junk!
...
<< headSprites nedry>> 
Hey you!
You're new around here right? 
Mind helping a friend out?
[[ Give a Dollar: |giveMoney]]
[[ Don't Give Dollar: |dontGiveMoney]]

title: giveMoney
body:
Thanks bud!
<< headSprites none>> 
*click*
<< headSprites nedry>>
Anyways, welcome to this dump we call a park.
I am definitely the most qualified here so if you want to know anything, just ask.

title: dontGiveMoney
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Alright fine then jerk.
Welcome to Jurrassic Park, a hole filled with dino dung and losers.
Don't worry, you'll fit right in.
Get lost.
<< nedryAlt true>>

title: nedryAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What do you want?
Did you have a change of heart all of a sudden?
[[ Give a Dollar: |giveMoneyAlt]]
[[ Don't Give Anything: |dontGiveMoneyAlt]]

title: giveMoneyAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What?
I mean, I guess I'll take it.
<< headSprites none>>
click
<< headSprites nedry>>
Alright.
You ticked me off earlier but I'll forgive it just this once.
Those other bums are too incompetent to do their jobs, so if you've got any questions ask away.

title: dontGiveMoneyAlt
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Yeah I thought so, get lost!

title: nedryAsk
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
What do you want new stuff?
[[ Hammond: |nedryAskHam]]
[[ Wu: |nedryAskWu]]
[[ Regis: |nedryAskRegis]]

title: nedryAskHam
body:
<< headSprites nedry>>
Oh, that guy.
Thanks to him, i'm forced to work here against my will.
A small job he said!
He lied so I left.
But APPARENTLY thats against the law.
So it's either 10 years in a cell, 20 years in debt, or this dump.

title: nedryAskWu
body: Empty Text

title: nedryAskRegis
body: Empty Text

title: Node
body: Empty Text
